typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['movies/movies.json']) ~> SouthridgeMovies
SouthridgeMovies derive(SourceSystemID = 1,
		GlobalMovieID = uuid(),
		ActorID = '',
		ActorGender = '',
		drvPhysicalAvailabilityDate = toString(availabilityDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		drvStreamingAvailabilityDate = toString(streamingAvailabilityDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) ~> DerivedColumns
DerivedColumns select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalMovieID,
		SourceSystemMovieID = id,
		SouthridgeMovieID = id,
		ActorID,
		ActorName = actorName,
		ActorGender,
		Title = title,
		Genre = genre,
		Rating = rating,
		RuntimeMinutes = runtime,
		TheatricalReleaseYear = releaseYear,
		PhysicalAvailabilityDate = drvPhysicalAvailabilityDate,
		StreamingAvailabilityDate = drvStreamingAvailabilityDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['cleanSouthrigeMoviesCatalog.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> cleanSouthrigeMoviesCatalog
